fixes.name: Delta Down CAD 2Y Diff
fixes.dax_expression: 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T CAD 2Y] * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Date Sign]
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the Tableau expression [Delta Down T CAD 2Y]*[Date Sign] to DAX by referencing the fields with the table[column] format. Kept the multiplication as a simple inline DAX expression and treated it as a measure because one of the referenced calculated fields (Date Sign) depends on Tableau parameters.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The expression references a calculated field ('Date Sign') that depends on Tableau parameters (e.g. [Parameters].[Use Custom Date]); per the rules, any parameter-based calculation must be created as a measure.
